target_name: Deepen the integration of the tourism sector into the rural economy to spread opportunities to rural communities
indicator_name: Annual change in tourism by air and sea arrivals
GoalDescription: A strong rural economy that creates opportunities, enables the development of rural communities and increasingly contributes to national prosperity
PolicyObjectiveDescription: Deepen the integration of the tourism sector into the rural economy to spread opportunities to rural communities
IndicatorDescription: Annual change in tourism by air and sea arrivals
Calculation/Formulation: Total Visitors minus total visitors previous year
ComputationMethod:
VISITORS (INCLUDE BOTH ARRIVAL AND DEPARTURE)
Annual Change: Number of visitors travelling by air in year 2(current year) – Number of Visitors Travelling by air in year 1(previous year)
Annual Change: Number of Visitors travelling by sea in year 2(Current year) – Number of Visitors Travelling by sea in year 1(previous year)

TOURIST
Annual Change: Number of Visitors and resident traveling in and out of the country by sea and air in year 1 (current year) Less (-) Number of visitors and resident traveling in and out the country by sea and air in year 2(previous year)

Percentage Change: Number of Visitors and resident traveling in and out of the country by sea and air in year 1 (current year) Less (-) Number of visitors and resident traveling in and out the country by sea and air in year 2(previous year) /(DIVIDED)
Number of Visitors and resident traveling in and out of the country by sea and air in year 1 (current year) x 100
Concept:
* Boats: incoming cruise ships
* International flights coming in through two international airports (Pekoa & Baurfield airport)
DataSource:
* VNSO international visitor’s arrival (IVA) reports annually
* Customs inland Revenue (CIR) annual visitor’s reports annually
Definition: Annual Change in the number of incoming flights (Air) and boats (Sea) for tourism purposes
IndicatorShortName: Change in Annual Tourism Arrivals by Air
Rationale:
* Indicates the impact of tourism on the economy
* Depicts the development of tourism sector in Vanuatu (Tourism activities developed)
